title: Tips on how to ace the twinning trend
text: Though this chic phenomenon is not entirely new, its popularity among people is on a rise thanks to its flamboyant presence on social media platforms. If done right, this a la mode fashion can add that extra bit of oomph to your attire. Take a moment and reminisce about the days when we would send out anxious messages to our gang asking them about their outfits. What they were donning for the night? What if our outfits matched? The horror! These momentous precautions have a taken a back seat with changing times. Matching outfits with your friend is no more a faux pas. Instead, it has become a raging and super fun trend that is here to stay! Twinning as a trend first emerged in South Korea’s K-pop culture. While coordinating your outfits completely is not an anomaly entirely, it can overpower the essence of your real personality and make you look, umm, a little too alike. But hey! We’ve got you covered. Have a look at these simple tips and tricks to ace the twinning game. Go ahead and make that winning statement with your fashion twin!
description: We’ve been witnessing a lot of doubles lately. Have you? We share some tips and tricks on how to successfully ace the twinning trend.
